creditline: Gift of Maï Diop, Galerie TËSSS..., Saint-Louis, Senegal
text: This man's cotton hat with multi-colored embroidery may be a fulan from the Hausa culture. MAde from narrow strip-cloth, fulan are usually decorated with elaborate embroidery, whose various designs often refer to specific events or people. The Hausa are credited for introduing this style of hat throughout western Africa.
title: Hat
